onb_sub1: Upload X-ray and let AI assist in detecting fractures.
onb_sub2: Import images from camera or gallery in seconds.
onb_sub3: Get clean, shareable reports ready for your workflow.
upload_to_start: Upload your X-ray image to start analysis
logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
question_1: What type of X-ray are you uploading?
question_2: Have you experienced pain in the injured area?
question_4: Can you move the injured part normally?
fracture_p1: The AI analysis indicates a potential bone fracture.
fracture_p2: There is a strong possibility of a fracture based on the model analysis.
fracture_warning: Please consult a medical specialist as soon as possible to confirm the diagnosis and begin appropriate treatment.
not_fractured_p1: The AI analysis does not detect any bone fracture in the uploaded image.
not_fractured_p2: If the image is not an actual medical X-ray (e.g., a normal camera photo), the model will also classify it as 'no fracture'.
not_fractured_p3: Please make sure you upload a proper medical X-ray for accurate results.
not_fractured_p4: If you still feel pain or symptoms, it is recommended to consult a medical specialist.
